line.originaltext: 1 (12 ounce) package refrigerated biscuit dough
1 (8 ounce) package corn bread mix
1 cup diced onion
1 cup diced celery
1/2 cup butter, softened
1/2 teaspoon salt
1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper
2 (14.5 ounce) cans chicken broth
1/8 pound pork sausage
2 hard-cooked eggs
1 teaspoon dried sage (optional)
Prepare biscuits (enough to make 4 cups crumbled), and one 8x8 inch pan cornbread according to package directions.
Prepare biscuits (enough to make 4 cups crumbled), and one 8x8 inch pan cornbread according to package directions.
line.annotation: do(ing0, , ing11, "biscuits", "Prepare biscuits (enough to make 4 cups crumbled) according to package directions")

line.originaltext: Prepare biscuits (enough to make 4 cups crumbled), and one 8x8 inch pan cornbread according to package directions.
line.annotation: do(ing1, t0, ing12, "cornbread", "Prepare cornbread according to package directions")

line.originaltext: Cool and crumble.
Cool and crumble.
Cool and crumble.
Cool and crumble.
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
In a small pot, combine onion, celery, margarine and chicken broth.
In a small pot, combine onion, celery, margarine and chicken broth.
line.annotation: combine({ing2, ing3, ing4, ing7}, ing15, "broth mix", "")

line.originaltext: In a small pot, combine onion, celery, margarine and chicken broth.
Bring to boil and cook vegetables until tender.
line.annotation: cook(ing15, t2, ing16, "boiled broth", "bring to boil and cook vegetables until tender")

line.originaltext: In a 2-quart casserole dish, combine 4 cups crumbled cornbread, 4 cups biscuit crumbs, salt, pepper, sausage, chopped eggs and sage.
In a 2-quart casserole dish, combine 4 cups crumbled cornbread, 4 cups biscuit crumbs, salt, pepper, sausage, chopped eggs and sage.
line.annotation: combine({ing10, ing13, ing14, ing5, ing6, ing8, ing9}, ing17, "bread mixture", "")

line.originaltext: In a 2-quart casserole dish, combine 4 cups crumbled cornbread, 4 cups biscuit crumbs, salt, pepper, sausage, chopped eggs and sage.
Pour broth and vegetables over bread mixture, and stir until combined.
line.annotation: combine({ing16, ing17}, ing18, "cornbread dressing", "pour broth over bread mixture")

line.originaltext: Pour broth and vegetables over bread mixture, and stir until combined.
line.annotation: mix(ing18, t3, ing19, "cornbread dressing", "stir until combined")

line.originaltext: Bake in the preheated oven for 30 to 45 minutes.
line.annotation: cook(ing19, t1, ing20, "baked cornbread dressing", "bake for 30 to 45 minutes")
